summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing increases in 1998 Seattle Aquarium and Woodland Park Zoo admissions and other fees; amending the 1997-1998 fee schedule for the use of park and recreation facilities established under Ordinance 118375(as amended); amending section 18.28.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code in connection therewith; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
